bibl.title: Studies Presented to Sterling Dow on his Eightieth Birthday
bibl.note: In Timarchum 40-41. Provenience unknown, early third century of our era.
bibl.seg: Willis William H., A Fragment of Aeschines among the Duke Papyri.
Studies Presented to Sterling Dow on his Eightieth Birthday = GRBM. 10 (Durham, North Carolina, 1984) pp. 311-314 et pl. 21.
